name: Regain control
description:
It is always challenging to understand what to remove and add to our routine.

Play as an artist who, within 12 months, will figure out what's best for her. 

Make space in the routine by dragging blocks to the bin and adding your good resolutions so they all fit. 

-Controls-

Hold the left button while on a block and move the mouse to drag it. 

Release the button to release the block.

-Credits-
